Hymn.Arabic: يَنْزِلُ مِثْلَ الْمَطَرِ عَلَى الْجَزَّةِ ، وَمِثْلَ قَطَرَاتٍ تَقْطُرُ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ ,
Hymn.English: 6 He shall come down like rain upon the grass before mowing, Like showers that water the earth.

Hymn.Arabic: يُشْرِقُ فِي أَيَّامِهِ الْعَدْلُ ، وَكَثْرَةُ السَّلَامِ هَلِلُويَا.
Hymn.English: 7 In His days the righteous shall flourish, And abundance of peace.     Alleluia
